t: What Is Amazon Family? - Amazon Customer Service
s: Both adults will keep their own personal account while sharing Prime benefits. Prime can't be shared with children. Prime Student members (trial or paid), Prime Video members (trial or paid), and customers who receive shipping benefits from another member can’t share their Prime benefits.

t: Share digital content with your Amazon Family - Amazon Customer Service
s: Family Library helps you share digital content with eligible members added to your Amazon Family.

t: Create Your Amazon Family - Amazon Customer Service
s: You can create an Amazon Family to share Prime benefits and a Family Library with another adult, up to four teens (who were added before April 7, 2025), and up to four children.

t: Share Amazon Prime with Your Family - Amazon Customer Service
s: Prime members can share select benefits with another adult, up to four teens, and up to four children in their Amazon Family household.
